t: Sing*pn to the Lord*s a new song; sing*ld to the Lord,*s all the earth.
Sing*ln to the Lord,*s praise his name; proclaim*ld his salvation day after day.
Declare*ln his glory among the nations, his*ld marvelous deeds among all peoples.
For*pn great is the Lord*s and most worthy of praise; he*ld is to be feared above all gods.
For*ln all the gods of the nations are idols, but*ld the Lord*s made the heavens.
Splendor*ln and majesty are before him; strength*ld and glory are in his sanctuary.
Ascribe*pn to the Lord,*s all you families of nations, ascribe*ld to the Lord*s glory and strength.
Ascribe*ln to the Lord*s the glory due his name; bring*ld an offering and come into his courts.
Worship*ln the Lord*s in the splendor of his holiness; tremble*ld before him, all the earth.
Say*ln among the nations, “The Lord*s reigns.” The*ld world is firmly established, it cannot be moved; he*ld will judge the peoples with equity.
Let*pn the heavens rejoice, let the earth be glad; let*ld the sea resound, and all that is in it.
Let*ln the fields be jubilant, and everything in them; let*ld all the trees of the forest sing for joy.
Let*ln all creation rejoice before the Lord,*s for he comes, he*ld comes to judge the earth. He*ln will judge the world in righteousness and*ld the peoples in his faithfulness.
